actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.
Received in the Senate under the authority of the order of June 24, 1982.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A concurrent resolution providing for adjournment of the House of Representatives beginning any day between Monday, June 28, 1982, to and including Friday July 2, 1982.

summary.text: Provides for an adjournment of the House of Representatives from any day between June 28 and July 2, 1982, until July 12, 1982, and of the Senate on July 1 or July 2, 1982, until July 12, 1982.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution providing for adjournment of the House of Representatives beginning any day between Monday, June 28, 1982, to and including Friday July 2, 1982.
